TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SharedSecretTokenProvider extends Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs.TokenProvider

Docs.summary: Provides methods that return name/value pairs for web token assertions, and that execute asynchronous shared secret token retrieval operations.
